data.title: Apple Scrapple Festival
data.text:
Apple Scrapple Planning Meetings

Beginning in February, Apple Scrapple Planning Meetings are usually held on the last Tuesday of the month at 6pm, held in the Bridgeville Library meeting room. The July 2024 meeting will be held on July 23rd at 6pm.

Little Miss Apple Scrapple Pageant

This event will be held on Friday, October 11th at 6:15pm on the main stage behind the Bridgeville Fire Hall.

Orchard Point Market

Visit T.S. Smith Orchard Point Market for more Family Fun during the Apple Scrapple Festival, located at the 9045 Redden Road. Inside the market, you will find a variety of fresh produce, along with apple cider donuts, fresh apple cider and slushies, and apple butter, all for a perfect autumn outing! Enjoy our delicious breakfast sandwiches or cold sandwiches from our OPM Caf√© and Grill. Relax while enjoying our outdoor seating area, petting zoo, fall decorations, pumpkins, and play area. Our Market is part of the historic 115-year-old T.S. Smith and Sons family farm, and the oldest apple orchard in Delaware and a Delaware Century Farm. For more info, visit www.orchardpointmarket.com or follow us on Facebook and Instagram.

Senior Center (Outside) Craft Show

The Senior Center Outside Show accepts vendors, such as businesses, crafters, and organizations! Tables and tables of goodies! Something for everyone!! Call Chairman Annette Cannon during the day at 302-337-8771 for information and applications or email her at [email protected].

Trade Show

***Trade Show is FULL and cannot accept any more vendors.***Lots of vendors, both individuals and businesses, will be showcasing their services and wares. The show, held on Walnut Street and Laws Street, begins bright and early at 9 am on Saturday and runs until around 5 pm. For more information please email us at [email protected]

Health & Safety Fair

Organizations such as Department of Justice, Bridgeville Fire Company, Delaware State Fire School, Blood Bank of Delaware, and many services such as flu shots are available in the Fire Hall. If your organization would like to be considered please fill out the Google Doc and your coordinator, Dawn, will reach out to you.

Trade Show

***The Trade Show cannot accept anymore Tastefully Simple, Scentsy, and Lilla Rose vendors.*** The show, held on Delaware Avenue and Laws Street, begins bright and early at 9 am on Saturday and runs until around 5 pm.
